          <title>
            <string language="en">Signs of a chemical reaction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichen einer chemischen Reaktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Signes d'une réaction chimique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sinais de uma reação química</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Segni di una reazione chimica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σημάδια μιας χημικής αντίδρασης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Muestras de una reacción química</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows an experiment which uses a thermometer to determine signs of a chemical reaction, when a strip of magnesium reacts with dilute hydrochloric acid in a test-tube.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">compounds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dilute hydrochloric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">displacement reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">eye protection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnesium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Measurement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reactivity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">test-tube</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermometer</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt einem Experiment, welcher 
Gebrauch ein Thermometer, Zeichen einer chemischen Reaktion 
festzustellen, wenn ein Streifen des Magnesiums mit verdünnter 
Salzsäure in einem Test-Gefäß reagiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre à une expérience quelles 
utilisations un thermomètre de déterminer des signes d'une réaction
chimique, quand une bande de magnésium réagit avec de l'acide 
chlorhydrique dilué dans un essai-tube.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra a uma experiência que usos 
um termômetro determinar sinais de uma reação química, quando uma 
tira do magnésio reage com o ácido hydrochloric diluído em um 
teste-tubo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra ad un esperimento quali usi 
un termometro determinare i segni di una reazione chimica, quando una 
striscia di magnesio reagisce con acido cloridrico diluito in un 
prova-tubo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει ένα πείραμα που 
χρησιμοποιεί ένα θερμόμετρο για να καθορίσει τα σημάδια μιας 
χημικής αντίδρασης, όταν αντιδρά μια λουρίδα του μαγνήσιου με το
αραιό υδροχλωρικό οξύ σε έναν δοκιμή-σωλήνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra a experimento qué 
aplicaciones un termómetro de determinar muestras de una reacción 
química, cuando una tira del magnesio reacciona con el ácido 
hidroclórico diluído en un prueba-tubo.</string>
          </description>
